snippet: The stepmother, Diana Metellus, 19, beat the girl, 7, then left her unsupervised in a room with no window guards, the police said, before she fell from a sixth-floor window.
abstract: Diana Metellus, stepmother of 7-year-old girl who was critically injured after falling from a sixth-floor window in Brooklyn, is arrested and charged with assault.
lead_paragraph: The stepmother, Diana Metellus, 19, beat the girl, 7, then left her unsupervised in a room with no window guards, the police said, before she fell from a sixth-floor window.

headline.main: Assault Charges for Stepmother After a Girl Falls
headline.print_headline: Assault Charges For Stepmother After a Girl Falls
